package.name: @cathedral/godot-vfx-library
package.description: Free Godot VFX Library - Sacred Geometry & Mystical Effects for Cathedral of Circuits

scripts.build: echo 'Building Godot VFX Library...' && mkdir -p dist && cp -r effects materials shaders scenes dist/
scripts.validate: echo 'Validating sacred mathematics in VFX...' && node validate-sacred-math.js
scripts.export: echo 'Exporting VFX assets for Godot...' && pnpm run build
